## Source: ossf-package-analysis (70047d0a5eb542220386cc3c3f7f8bd4bee3faa63ce2124f363abcc1503be3df)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'nnabla-ext-cuda101-nccl2-ubuntu16' @ 0.0.2 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
